articles.title: Ford spotted testing plug-in hybrid Ranger - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Ford has been seen putting a plug-in hybrid Ranger through its paces in Southern Europe.
articles.content:
Ford has been seen testing the next generation of Ranger ute over in Southern Europe recently, and it looks to be the anticipated plug-in hybrid model.

articles.author: Jonathan Chadwick
articles.title: Exoplanet 35 light years away has half the mass of Venus, study says - Daily Mail
articles.description: Astronomers used the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope (VLT), located in the Atacama Desert of northern Chile to shed light on the neighbouring planetary system, L 98-59.
articles.content:
A tiny, rocky exoplanet that orbits a star 35 light years away from Earth is half the mass of Venus, a new study reveals.  
The planet, called L 98-59b, is the closest planet to its star, called L 9… [+7358 chars]
